snippet: The security breach, which Adobe called a part of a “sophisticated attack,” allowed hackers to obtain encrypted passwords and other personal information from customers.
abstract: Software company Adobe discloses security breach in which hackers infiltrated computer systems and gained access to credit card information and other personal data from 2.9 million of its customers.
lead_paragraph: The security breach, which Adobe called a part of a “sophisticated attack,” allowed hackers to obtain encrypted passwords and other personal information from customers.
